summary: A follower I made for myself a while ago, decided to put it out for anyone who likes it.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6][color=#000000]-------------------------------------------------                      [/color][color=#980000]  [/color][b][u][color=#ff0000] FaasnuDovahDuckahFus
[/color][/u][/b][/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#000000][size=6]-------------------------------------------------
                [/size][/color][/font][color=#000000][font=Times New Roman][b]This is just a average run of the mill follower,  Nothing special, Just thought I'd share it on the Nexus.
[/b][/font][size=6]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------  [/size][center]This follower is a Nord man,
who is determined to stand by you,
and fight for his country.
No matter what side of the war,
what deed you do,
or what deed you want him to do.[/center][u][b][font=Verdana]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[/font][/b][/u][font=Courier New][center][size=5]Hope you enjoy this mod please share it to your friends who want a follower who won't wine when you open there inventory.
[/size][size=6]Now I will preface this now, the shout option given to Faas will be optional in the future due to the fact he will often accidentally injure you with his Thu'um. Regards - Faas  
[b]
[/b][/size][b]Screenshot weather effect credit to[/b] - Directors Tools by [b]Artisanix[/b][/center]
[/font][/color]
author: FaasnuDovahDuckah
